thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: The Big One Microfiber Pillow Only $3.49 Shipped (Regularly $11.99)
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: The Big One Microfiber Pillow Only $3.49 Shipped (Regularly $11.99)

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: The Big One Microfiber Pillow Only $3.49 Shipped (Regularly $11.99)
text:
Kohl’s Cardholders! Through February 20th, hop on over to Kohl’s.com where Kohl’s cardholders can save 30% off your entire purchase with the code LOVE30 at checkout AND score FREE shipping with the code FEB4FREE. Plus, BOTH of these codes can be stacked together!
As one idea, this highly rated The Big One Microfiber Standard/Queen Size Pillow is on sale for just $4.99 (regularly $11.99) – making it only $3.49 shipped after codes LOVE30 & FEB4FREE at checkout!
Plus, through February 15th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend online or in-store. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from February 16th-26th. Awesome!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off your entire purchase with code SAVE15 at checkout (exp. 2/15). Shipping is free on $75 orders or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available.
(Thanks, Lauren!)
